thread.title: House of Fisher retains ASAP Quality Marque
thread.title_full: House of Fisher retains ASAP Quality Marque

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: House of Fisher retains ASAP Quality Marque
text:
House of Fisher retains ASAP Quality Marque House of Fisher retains ASAP Quality Marque Details Category: Hotel   16:00 House of Fisher, the Thames Valley serviced apartment and apart-hotel specialist, has successfully retained the coveted Quality Assessment Marque from the Association of Serviced Apartment Providers (ASAP), after improving on scores from last year in a recent Quality Assessment. 
The ASAP marque confirms that House of Fisher meets all the core compliance of legal, health & safety requirements and good practice and delivers a minimum standard of quality expected by all customers. House of Fisher provides stylish and spacious serviced apartments and apart hotel accommodation across the Thames Valley. All their serviced apartments and apart hotels are centrally located close to transport links, shops and restaurants and all offer fully equipped kitchens, flat screen TVs, unlimited free broadband internet and high levels of security and safety. A 24 hour guest services team ensures guests have access to everything needed for a comfortable stay. Robert Brown, Business Development Director at House of Fisher comments: “House of Fisher is a name clients can trust and is a preferred supplier for many multi-national, blue chip companies as well independent travellers. Customer satisfaction is our first priority and we take pride in delivering high standards of accommodation and a consistently positive customer experience. We are delighted with the recent Quality award and we hope it will provide future clients with high levels of confidence when booking with us.” Related articles
